select o.* , m.name as member_name from v_order o left join v_member m on o.member_id = m.id where 1 = 1 and o.status = 1
and m.name like CONCAT('%',#{memName},'%')
and m.mobile like CONCAT('%',#{mobile},'%')
and o.order_source = #{orderSource}
and o.store_id = #{storeId}
and o.order_no like CONCAT('%',#{orderNo},'%')
order by orderByField ASC
order by orderByField DESC
order by o.create_time DESC

select o.*, s.`name` AS storeName from v_order o JOIN v_store s ON s.id = o.store_id where 1 = 1 and o.status = 1
and o.member_id = #{memberId}

select o.*, s.`name` AS storeName, i.* from v_order_item i LEFT JOIN v_order o ON o.id= i.order_id LEFT JOIN v_store s ON s.id = o.store_id where 1 = 1 and o.status = 1
and i.order_id = #{orderId}
SELECT SUM(payment) AS payment FROM v_order WHERE DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') = 1 AND member_id = 1 AND `status` = 1
